Blog.post: urlLink okay......This is a pic of me in our JS prom during my senior year.I'm the on in the middle...duh!Watchathink of my outfit?That's couture. urlLink

i just finished this speech in class about speciesist double standards and they did not understand.......they are so shallow.......what they want is something shallow like those obviou into your face topics.....what dumb people!!!!!!

i watched this fashion show just a few hours ago. it was held in our skul featuring designs by the 3rd year students of our fashion design and merchandising.....i also watched last friday, a fashion show featuring designs of the graduating class.....i'm so excited for our batch'es turn...they were nice , too bad i don't have a digital cam yet....i could have juz poted them....i only have a phonecam but not good enough.....maybe in my future postings...we'll see...speaking of fashion shows let me just show you a pic from our js prom when i was a senior....after this....

YOU GOT THAT RIGHT! it just popped out of my thoughts because i remembered what my filipino friend staying in canada told me. She was asked by her fooriegn classmate there if how long she has stayed in canada.My riend answered "a month or so," the guy replied," i thought you have stayed here longer cause you speak english well because i thought that schools in the Philippines are just huts."......that guy's a loser! did you guys know that some universities in the philippines are among the best in the world......some of which were one of the first schools to have a state-of-the art web sites in the world....... Filipinos are one of the best english speakers.......We know proper english not just american street slangs.......heck, were even better at proper english than some americans........just stating my thoughts..............;p that's all for now

Its very late but i still cant sleep.I have to finish the outline of my position paper tomorrow and pass it on the same day....Sheesh.... __________________________________ Do you Yahoo!? New and Improved Yahoo! Mail - 100MB free storage! http://promotions.yahoo.com/new_mail

I'm so tired of drawing human figures in the natural method.......i'm not good at it. i have dis plate to finish before friday next week but i'm so tired to do it.......i mean i have to draw 16 figures with detail........i'm so stressed.....dat's all

hello guys! wellcome to my psychotic brain(or thoughts)......... let me introduce myself,i'm a fresh fassshion design student........i'm away from home....cebu.......i'm stunying at m,in manila,so dis s a way 2 thwart stress...blogging....yeah!..........enjoy being crazy.........hehehe...................
